summary: When a woman discovers that her husband has been unfaithful to her, she decides to respond to his infidelities in kind.
cast: Norma Shearer|Chester Morris|Conrad Nagel|Robert Montgomery|Florence Eldridge|Helene Millard|Robert Elliott|Mary Doran|Tyler Brooke|Zelda Sears|George Irving|Judith Wood|Neal Dodd|Charles R. Moore|Lee Phelps|George Reed|Andy Shuford|Carl Stockdale|Jack Trent|Theodore von Eltz
title: La divorciada
